meanings.sent1: I rewinded the string around the spool.
meanings.sent2: She rewinded the video to watch her favorite part again.
meanings.sent3: The clock rewinded itself and started ticking backwards!
meanings.sent4: Her memory rewinded to a time when things were simpler.
meanings.sent5: The old music player rewinded the cassette with a satisfying click.

meanings.sent1: He rewinded the tape to listen to the beginning again.
meanings.sent2: They rewinded the movie to catch the scene they missed.
meanings.sent3: The cat rewinded the yarn into a tangled mess.
meanings.sent4: The river rewinded its course after the dam was removed.
meanings.sent5: The teacher rewinded the lesson for the students who were absent.
